structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.catch_line: Hogs, unlawful to permit on public levee.
law.text: No person shall permit any hog owned by him to run at large on any public levee.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938a-12.
